001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.util.Log;
005import android.view.LayoutInflater;
006import android.view.Menu;
007import android.view.View;
008import android.view.ViewGroup;
009import android.widget.PopupMenu;
010import android.widget.Toast;
011import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
012import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
013import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
014import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
015import androidx.navigation.NavController;
016import androidx.navigation.NavDirections;
017import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
018import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.R;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.databinding.FragmentBoardBinding;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Board;
022import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Ship;
023import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.GameViewModel;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.List;
026
027/**
028 * Demonstrates access to and observation of {@link androidx.lifecycle.LiveData} elements in
029 * {@link GameViewModel}, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder. This fragment is used to
030 * inflate a board object for a game, and handle the movement and placement of ships for a specific
031 * game.
032 */
033@AndroidEntryPoint
034public class BoardFragment extends Fragment {
035
036  private static final String TAG = BoardFragment.class.getSimpleName();
037  public static final String BOARD_INDEX_KEY = "board_index";
038
039  private FragmentBoardBinding binding;
040  private GameViewModel viewModel;
041  private int boardIndex;
042  private Board board;
043
044  @Override
045  public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
046    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
047    boardIndex = getArguments().getInt(BOARD_INDEX_KEY);
048  }
049
050  @Nullable
051  @Override
052  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater,
053      @Nullable ViewGroup container, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
054    binding = FragmentBoardBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
055    return binding.getRoot();
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
060    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
061    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(GameViewModel.class);
062    viewModel.getGame()
063        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (game) -> {
064          board = game.getBoards().get(boardIndex);
065          if (!board.isFleetSunk()) {
066            binding.gameBoard.setSize(game.getBoardSize());
067            binding.gameBoard.setBoard(board);
068            binding.gameBoard.setClickListener((gridX, gridY, ship) -> Log.d(TAG,
069                String.format("clicked: %1$d, %2$d, %3$s", gridX, gridY, ship)));
070            binding.placeShips.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
071            if (!board.isPlaced() && board.isMine()) {
072              binding.placeShips.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
073              binding.gameBoard.setLongClickListener(this::handleLongClick);
074              binding.placeShips.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.submitShips(boardIndex));
075            } else if (game.isYourTurn()) {
076              binding.gameBoard.setClickListener((gridX, gridY, ship) -> {
077                viewModel.toggleShots(boardIndex, gridX, gridY);
078              });
079            }
080          } else if (game.isFinished()) {
081            boolean win = game.getBoards()
082                .stream()
083                .noneMatch((board) -> board.isMine() && board.isFleetSunk());
084            NavController navController = Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot());
085            NavDirections directions = win
086                ? GameFragmentDirections.navigateToWinDialog()
087                : GameFragmentDirections.navigateToLoseDialog();
088            navController.navigate(directions);
089          }
090        });
091    viewModel.getPendingShots()
092        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (shotMap) -> {
093          boolean[][] pendingShots = shotMap.get(boardIndex);
094          binding.gameBoard.setShots(pendingShots);
095        });
096    viewModel.getThrowable()
097        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (throwable) ->
098            Toast.makeText(requireContext(), throwable.toString(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show());
099  }
100
101  private void handleLongClick(int gridX, int gridY, float viewX, float viewY, Ship ship) {
102    Log.d(TAG,
103        String.format("longClicked: %1$d, %2$d, %4$f, %5$f, %3$s", gridX, gridY, ship, viewX,
104            viewY));
105    if (ship != null) {
106      float widthFraction = (viewX + binding.gameBoard.getX()) / binding.getRoot().getWidth();
107      float heightFraction = (viewY + binding.gameBoard.getY()) / binding.getRoot().getHeight();
108      binding.horizontalGuideline.setGuidelinePercent(heightFraction);
109      binding.verticalGuideline.setGuidelinePercent(widthFraction);
110      PopupMenu popupMenu = new PopupMenu(requireContext(), binding.popUpMenuFocus);
111      Menu menu = popupMenu.getMenu();
112      popupMenu.getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.ship_actions, menu);
113      menu.findItem(R.id.rotate).setOnMenuItemClickListener(item -> tryRotation(ship));
114      menu.findItem(R.id.move).setOnMenuItemClickListener(item -> handleMoveClick(ship));
115      popupMenu.show();
116    }
117  }
118
119  private boolean tryRotation(Ship ship) {
120    List<Ship> placement = new LinkedList<>(board.getShips());
121    Ship rotatedShip = new Ship(ship.getX(), ship.getY(), ship.getLength(), !ship.isVertical());
122    placement.remove(ship);
123    placement.add(rotatedShip);
124    viewModel.changePlacement(placement, boardIndex);
125    return true;
126  }
127
128  private boolean handleMoveClick(Ship ship) {
129    ship.setSelected(true);
130    binding.gameBoard.invalidate();
131    binding.gameBoard.setClickListener((gridX, gridY, s) -> {
132      ship.setSelected(false);
133      binding.gameBoard.setClickListener(null);
134      if (s == null || s.equals(ship)) {
135        tryMovement(gridX, gridY, ship);
136      }
137    });
138    return true;
139  }
140
141  private void tryMovement(int gridX, int gridY, Ship ship) {
142    List<Ship> movement = new LinkedList<>(board.getShips());
143    Ship movedShip = new Ship(gridX, gridY, ship.getLength(), ship.isVertical());
144    movement.remove(ship);
145    movement.add(movedShip);
146    viewModel.changePlacement(movement, boardIndex, movedShip);
147  }
148
149
150}
